mapper.select: SELECT RGL_FNT_D , (SELECT B.CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_M A , T_CMZ_CD_D B WHERE 1=1 AND A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.CD_ID = B.CD_ID AND A.CD_ID = 'BIL_TP_CD' AND B.CD_VLD_VAL = '1' AND A.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS') AS BIL_TP_CD_NM FROM TB_RVCL_BIL_SCHD_BAS WHERE BIL_YM = #{bilYm} AND BIL_TP_CD = '1' AND BIL_SCHD_MPY_MTHD_TP_CD IN ('02', '03') AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT RGL_FNT_D , (SELECT B.CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_M A , T_CMZ_CD_D B WHERE 1=1 AND A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.CD_ID = B.CD_ID AND A.CD_ID = 'BIL_TP_CD' AND B.CD_VLD_VAL = '1' AND A.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS') AS BIL_TP_CD_NM FROM TB_RVCL_BIL_SCHD_BAS WHERE BIL_YM = #{bilYm} AND BIL_TP_CD = '1' AND BIL_SCHD_MPY_MTHD_TP_CD IN ('01', '03') AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
